Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bowl
Description: Black and red hemispherical vase with a rounded base, restricted mouth and simple lip.  Both surfaces were burnished and the gloss is partly preserved. The later is vertical on the interior surface, which is of a deep black, and horizontal on the exterior surface, which bears a dark red slip.
